activities: Knowledge Wave provides consulting, software, and services to help enterprise organizations create actionable business intelligence, measure business performance, leverage their technology investments, and drive actionable improvement.  One component of our services is to provide direct customer feedback and fuse that opinion data with operational data.  The only personal information we receive is customer information directly from a client organization.  The only uses we have for the information are to 1. ask for opinions and feedback and 2. to perform detailed and actionable analysis on the feedback.  We do not in any way distribute client data other than to the client.  In the event that our client has requested we provide a confidential and anonymous survey, we do not provde any personally identifiable information back to the client.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
